    • Method Detail

      • getLevel

        public Map getLevel()

      • loadLevel

        public boolean loadLevel(java.lang.String levelName)
        This method uses the LoadGame class to load the game using the given levelName parameter to find which level to load.
        Parameters:
        levelName - Name of the level to load
        Returns:
        True if the level was loaded correctly False if error occured and level was not loaded

      • saveLevel

        public boolean saveLevel(java.lang.String levelName)
        This method will save the level using the SaveGame class using the given levelName parameter to set the name of the level.
        Parameters:
        levelName - The name of the level to be saved
        Returns:
        True if the level is saved correctly False if the level was not saved correctly due to an error

      • getValue

        public Block getValue(java.awt.Point p)
        This method will return the Block at the given point if possible
        Parameters:
        p - the coordinate of the block to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the Block object at the given point p null if the coordinate is out of bounds

      • setValue

        public boolean setValue(java.awt.Point p,
               Block b)
        This method will set the given Block b at the given Point p
        Parameters:
        p - coordinate of where the block will be placed
        b - the Block object which will be placed at point p
        Returns:
        True if the block was placed successfully False if the point was out of bounds or occured
